title: Mini-Ep 228: Seasons of Life
itunes:title: Mini-Ep 228: Seasons of Life
itunes:subtitle: Kate is back from vacation and ready to give Doree the pep talk she needs about feeling messy. Then, they answer listener questions about reaching out to a college crush, the reemergence of Bennifer, and struggling with the grief of a dying friend....
description:
Kate is back from vacation and ready to give Doree the pep talk she needs about feeling messy. Then, they answer listener questions about reaching out to a college crush, the reemergence of Bennifer, and struggling with the grief of a dying friend. 


  • To leave a voicemail or text for a future episode, reach us at 781-591-0390. You can also email the podcast at forever35podcast@gmail.com.
  • Visit forever35podcast.com for links to everything we mention on the show.
  • Follow us on Twitter (@Forever35Pod) and Instagram (@Forever35Podcast) and join the Forever35 Facebook Group (Password: Serums). 
  • Sign up for the newsletter! At forever35podcast.com/newsletter
